title: GotoTruus
body:
Press put concoction on statue button


"Vriend! Luckily the SS did not catch you!"


Give the Daffodils button.


"Oh! Good! If we want to end the occupation of the Square we need to move quickly"

This document will set us free. 

My contact is waiting in front of the University Building"


Pick up Declaration button

<<if visited("Truus")is true>> [[ Go to Nassau|GotoNassau|]]

Truus van Lier's character sheet appears

Route to next location appears
